title: Fat woman
description: Unexpected weight gain caused her lose her happiness! Where does a woman who lost everything end up?ã€€Kikuchi Hanako, who's beauty and career that most envy, is at the height of happiness as she prepares to marry her handsome colleague, Hiroyuki. However, she suddenly started to gain weight without any changes to her life, and the people around her suddenly belittled her any chance they'd get. Could Natsumi, who is Hanako's best friend really be pulling the strings?.
author: Kai Kyoko
